title: Episode 18 - Kira Soltanovich
itunes:title: Episode 18 - Kira Soltanovich
description: Kira Soltanovich and I have been in steam rooms, saunas and Russian Baths and today we break bread, drink wine and treat ourselves to Russian pastries.  She's a great comedian and has a new season of Let's Get Sweat out now on YouTube!
content:encoded: Kira Soltanovich and I have been in steam rooms, saunas and Russian Baths and today we break bread, drink wine and treat ourselves to Russian pastries.  She's a great comedian and has a new season of Let's Get Sweat out now on YouTube!
